column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I would list this as top 1-2 steak house in Chicago and top 5 in the US.  While the atmosphere is on the dark side it has a great vibe and the service is spot on.  Chicago has endless Steakhouse options
column2: I've been to all the best ones new and old.  This should be one of your top choices if you want a fantastic steak.
